title: Drawing, "Design for ink stand", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black, graphite, on cream laid paper
inscribed:
Below, brown ink: No. 56180; graphite: 64f
Left center, graphite: 76 f
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Oval base decorated with band of overlapping acanthus leaves, applied leaf design above, holds ink pot with open lid, the front showing a mask with protruding tongue. Pen holders, in shape of a horn, flank the pot.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for ink stand", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black, graphite, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-157.
